name: IntelliTrack
tag_list: inventory-management, asset-mangement, warehouse-management, rfid, fixed-assets, barcodes, package-track, 3pl-warehouse--logistics
overview:
IntelliTrack, Inc. develops software for inventory management including barcode, RFID, and batch and wireless fidelity data collections on mobile computers and wireless terminals. Its software is used for inventory control, warehouse management, and asset tracking applications in businesses. The company provides data management software, an inventory and asset tracking software for stockroom inventory, inventory, check in-out, fixed assets, and package tracks applications. It also offers warehouse management systems, such as IntelliTrack WMS for cycle counting, kitting, replenishment, and space management to manage warehouse operations with wireless technology; IntelliTrack ISRP for inventory, shipping, receiving, and picking for small warehouses; and IntelliTrack 3PL Software that provide supply chain management tools. In addition, the company provides software services system analysis, custom software development, software training services, onsite and Web based training, implementation, and support services. The companyâ€™s products are used for banking, construction, distribution, e-commerce, gaming and casinos, government, hospitality and hotel, insurance, manufacturing, telecommunications, and transportation industries, as well as online stores, medical offices, hospitals, military units, museums, non-profit organizations, religious institutions, and schools.

IntelliTrack, Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Hunt Valley, Maryland.

products.name: DMS, WMS, Inventory, Stockroom, Check In-Out, Package Track, RFID, Fixed Assets, ISRP, 3PL
